QueryId : 774
Cwe : 89

Source

 CxList db = Find_DB() ;
CxList sanitize = Find_Sanitize();

CxList dbParams = All.GetParameters(db);

result = All.FindSQLInjections(db + Find_Read() - All.FindByShortName("executenonquery"), 
								dbParams, sanitize);
